description: React component for the report detail page, including fetching report data, editing, and actions like exporting, sharing, deleting, and generating AI summaries.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Updates the report with current form data and shows a success toast.

methods.name: genSummary
methods.description: Triggers the mock AI summary generation and shows a success toast.

methods.name: exportPdf
methods.description: Placeholder function for exporting report to PDF, shows an info toast.

methods.name: share
methods.description: Placeholder function for sharing the report via email or Slack, shows an info toast.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes the report, shows a success toast, and navigates back to reports list.
